com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations

Class BasePointCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.Annotation
      • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.BasePointCollection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Annotation>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Polygon, Polyline
    Deprecated. 
    As of 7.0.0, use Mapbox Annotation Plugin instead

    @Deprecated
public abstract class BasePointCollection
extends Annotation
    Multipoint is an abstract annotation for combining geographical locations.

        @NonNull
public java.util.List<LatLng> getPoints()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a copy of the points.
        Returns:
        A List of points.

      • setPoints

        public void setPoints(@NonNull
                      java.util.List<LatLng> points)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the points of this polyline. This method will take a copy of the points, so further mutations to points will have no effect on this polyline.
        Parameters:
        points - A List of LatLng points making up the polyline.

      • addPoint

        Parameters:
